text: Peter (Balazs) Záboji (25 December 1943 – 3 July 2015Elhunyt Záboji Péter, a startup világ egyik meghatározó szereplője ) was a Hungarian investor and entrepreneur. He has contributed significantly to the development of start up businesses in Budapest and received the highest civil recognition from the president of Hungary. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Budapest
title: Peter Záboji
